idea-plugin.name: Chinese-English Translate
idea-plugin.description:
Translate: Select Chinese and press ctrl+alt+; automatically replaced with English
It also automatically transitions to hump form
翻译：选中中文，按下ctrl + alt + ;自动替换为英文
并且还会自动转为驼峰形式
